inn1.comm: a terrific first ball in international cricket, pitching on a good length around off and jagging back into the right-hander, the batsman prods from his crease and is cut in half, the ball beats in inside edge and goes over the top of middle and leg stump
good length outside off, Sibanda lets it go
that's not so good, a full ball flying down leg side, Karthik dives to his left and makes the save
hits a good length outside off and moves away from the right-hander, Sibanda tries to drive and is beaten
Sibanda prods from his crease at a good length ball that holds its line outside off and is beaten
the attempted bouncer does not get very high and Sibanda still ducks under it
Sibanda tries to punch off the back foot through cover point and is beaten. Apart from that wide, that is a near-perfect first over from the debutant
Raza lets the first ball go through to the keeper
pitches on a good length outside off and moves away, Raza covers his off stump and lets it go
Shami gets the ball to pitch on a good length around off and nip away from the right-hander, Razadoes well to let it go
an appeal for lbw but the impact was too high. Shami pitched on a straighter line and got the ball to straighten on the right-hander, who played across the line from his crease and was squared up
a fuller ball hits the pad this time and there's another appeal for leg before, that was missing leg stump, Raza fell over in his crease after attempting the flick
short of a length and straight, Raza tucks it off his hips behind square, first runs off the bat in this innings
Mohit gets the ball to nip into the right-hander from a good length outside off, Sibanda lets it go and Karthik fumbles the take as the ball swerves to his left
Sibanda should have been forward to that ball, instead he was back in his crease while prodding at a full ball outside off and was beaten
good length outside off, let alone by the batsman
width outside off stump, the length was shortish as well, the ball moved away from the right-hander a touch and Sibanda resisted the urge to cut
good length on a tight line just outside off, Sibanda stays in his crease and shoulders arms
another one on a good length outside off, left alone by the batsman, Mohit's bowled his first maiden over
dabbed off the back foot behind point for a single
on a good length outside off, Sibanda strides forward and lifts his bat out of the way
extra bounce outside off stump, Sibanda sees some width on offer and slashes but is beaten
caution from Sibanda, striding forward and letting a good length ball go outside off, 15 balls he's played without a run
Sibanda gets off the mark with a quick single after defending an inswinger down by his feet
the bouncer to end the over, the batsman ducks under it
short ball, Sibanda moves back and slightly across to pull towards long leg
good length and straight, Raza gets behind the line and defends
wide outside off stump, that was there to be hit but Raza missed the cut, he just tried to hit it too hard and didn't move his feet
Mohit hits the pad with one that cuts back into the right-hander and appeals for lbw, that was high
short and wide outside off stump, a hit-me ball, Raza doesn't miss this time, moving back and slapping through cover point
excellent ball, on a good length just outside off, the ball holds its line and beats Raza's bat as he defends on the front foot
he's beaten by a good length ball that nips back a little into the right-hander, that went between bat and body
short of a length around off, Sibanda stays in his crease and shoulders arms
a fuller length and Sibanda drives from his crease, presenting a straight bat and placing the ball past the fielder at mid-off
defended on the leg side
that looked very pretty, a full ball driven on the front foot to extra cover, but I don't think he timed that well
good length and straight, Sibanda stays in his crease and plays towards midwicket
short of a length outside off, Raza begins to prod outside off but pulls his bat inside the line
worked off the pads off the back foot through square leg
good length on a tight line outside off, Raza shoulders arms

there's his first wicket in one-day cricket! An excellent ball too. It landed on a good length on off stump, drawing the batsman forward for a defensive push. The ball nipped away off the seam just enough to take the outside edge through to Karthik
a full ball outside off, Masakadza drives it through point for a single
a superb ball, pitched on a good length just outside off, shaping into the right-hander with the angle before seaming away, Sibanda prodded inside the line and was beaten
short of a length at the body, played down off the hips on the leg side
played with soft hands close on the off side for a quick single
good length around off stump, defended from the crease towards point
that's strayed down leg side for the second wide of the innings
defended back to the bowler
flicked off the pads through square
defended on the off side
oh my! He let that go and the ball nipped back in off a good length and went over the top of off and middle stumps
a full ball driven crisply off the front foot and well stopped by mid-off diving to his right
Mishra fumbles at third man to allow the second, a shoddy effort. Sibanda tried to drive that through cover but got a thick outside edge. Mohit's bowling a tight line outside off
shot! That was slightly uppish but also in the gap at point. Sibanda came forward to a length ball and square drove on the up
stays back to a good length ball on off and defends towards point
moves into the right-hander after pitching outside off, defended on the back foot
defended from the crease on the off side
length ball on off stump, punched from the crease towards extra cover
defended back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, left alone by the batsman
that is some shot! He came forward to a short ball, and slightly towards the off to get inside the line, and then he lifted the ball off his body over the long leg boundary
that's a full ball down leg side
pushed off the front foot towards point
Sibanda was on the front foot too early for a slower ball delivered from the back of the hand, he got hit on the pad and then ran a leg bye towards point
good length just outside off, defended on the front foot to cover
short of a length and straight, Masakadza sways and sinks to his knees to let the ball pass

Jadeja's taken aim and demolished the stumps at the bowler's end and Masakadza is short of the crease! Masakadza pushed a slower ball towards point and set off. Jadeja got to the ball quickly from point, picked up with his left hand and flung the ball at the stumps in one smooth motion. That's his second direct hit run-out in two games.
good length shaping into the right-hander, Sibanda stays in his crease and defends
short ball and Sibanda ducks under it
short of a length around off, defended on the back foot on the off side
good length on off and middle, giving the batsman little to work with, Taylor defends from his crease
short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover
played from the crease towards midwicket
good length on off and middle, Taylor stays in his crease and closes the face to play towards square leg
driven from the crease towards mid off
pitches on a length in line with the stumps and slants across Taylor, who lets the ball go
a fuller length but the line is outside off stump, Taylor strides forward and lets it go again
played off the back foot through point
fuller and wider outside the off stump, Sibanda shoulders arms
Sibanda moves forward to a full ball angling across him and drives gracefully towards wide mid-off, where Pujara dives to his left but can't stop the shot
driven firmly off the front foot to long-off, Pujara runs in to field
goes back to work the ball square but misses and is hit on the pad
bowled slowly through the air on middle and off, played off the front foot towards point
played from the crease on the off side, Jadeja fields himself
goes back and nudges the ball off his pads towards short fine leg

an appeal for lbw and after a while the umpire sends Taylor on his way! I thought that was missing leg stump. Jadeja went wide of the crease and angled the ball into the right-hander from round the wicket, Taylor came on to the front foot to defend and was beaten on the inside edge. He was hit in front of leg stump so I think he's unlucky to be given out. That would have missed leg stump
pitches wide off the batsman outside off stump. Left alone by the batsman.
full and pitching on off stump. Driven to mid off.
fuller and on stump. Sibanda comes forward and drives through the gap between long off and extra-cover.

what a ball! pitches on off stump and at a good length. Williams plays inside of the line and ends up having his off stump knocked back. Tough delivery first up. Zimbabwe in real trouble here at 47 for 4
pitches on a length outside off stump. Waller content to leave it alone.
slightly shorter of a good length. Again outside off. Waller leaves this alone.
on a length and wide of off stump. Carries straight through to the keeper.

What is going on with Zimbabwe? Yet another wicket topples, this time Jadeja pitches on a length right on off stump, with the ball slightly drifting in after pitching. Sibanda plays all around this and ends up getting castled. He is bowled off the pad. Only 15 overs in and this match looks a foregone conclusion.
pitched full and on off and middle, almost darted in.
tossed up on off, Waller plays it to the off side
on a length on off stump. Defended by the batsman
full and outside off. Elton plays it back to the bowler.
flatter delivery on the stumps, Waller gets back and defends it
on a length on off stump. Elton defends to the offside.
pitches on a length outside off stump. Elton content to let it through to the keeper.
short of a length wide of off stump. Elton considers playing this one square off the back foot, but ends up playing a false shot as the ball carries through
short of a length outside off stump. Carries harmlessly to the keeper.
short of a length, angling sharply into the batsman. Elton plays it under his eyes off the back foot and scampers for a quick single.
short of a length, pitched wide of off stump. Goes straight to the keeper.
slightly full on off stump. Defended to the offside.
on a length on middle and leg. Elton shuffles down but ends up playing straight to the fielder on the offside
short of a length on middle, Elton opens his blade and caresses this through third man for a boundary. Just evades first slip.
on a length on middle and leg. Defended to the offside.
full and on off stump. Elton gets forward and drives to long off for a single.
on a length on middle stump. Waller defends off the back foot.
wide of off stump. Elton happy to let it go through to the keeper.
pitched on a length outside off but angling in sharply. Elton defends off the back foot.
wide and on a fuller length. Elton plays a drive through cover for a couple
just outside off stump and goes straight to the keeper.
full and on off stump. Defended to the offside.
full and on off stump, angling towards the slip. Waller gets forward and opens the face to play a square drive in between point and cover for a couple.
on a length on middle stump. Elton defends to the bowler.
short of a length on off stump and he gets back to drive through sweeper cover for a boundary
tossed up on off, Chigumbura gets forward and pushes it to mid on
quicker delivery on the pads, Waller gets back to flick, pads it to the leg side
lighted delivery on off, Waller comes forward and defends it
on a length pitched wide of off stump. Elton cuts it square for a couple
slightly fuller on off stump. Defended to the offside.
on a length on middle stump. Elton plays it to long on for a single.
flighted delivery outside off, Waller comes forward and drives it to sweeper cover
fuller delivery on off stump. Elton pushes through the offside for a single.
full delivery on off and middle. Defended back to the bowler.
on a length pitched outside off. Elton opens the face and tries to steer through backward point, but is stopped by a brilliant dive from Ambati Rayudu, and only gets a single
on middle and leg. Defended to the bowler.
pitches outside off stump, drifting in. Defended to the offside.
tossed up on off, Waller comes forward and taps it to covers
slightly fuller length on off stump. Elton plays this through cover for a single.
flighted delivery, slightly full and outside off. Waller looks to drive this through extra-cover, but ends up hitting this through mid on for none
fuller delivery on off stump. Waller gets forward and drives to long off
fuller delivery, flighted on off stump. Elton drives straight to extra-cover
pitches on a length on off and middle, with the ball spinning away after pitching. Almost drags this on as he tries to chop the ball through the offside.
Chigumbura defends it on the frontfoot
flighted delivery on off, Malcolm Waller defends it
flatter delivery on off, Waller comes on the frontfoot and blocks it to the off side
flighted delivery on off, Waller pushes it to point
short of a length on middle. Waller defends it to the bowler
quicker on the stumps, Waller leans on the frontfoot and defends it back to the bowler
flighted delivery outside off, Waller gets back and cuts it to covers
fuller delivery on off and middle. Elton works this away to the leg side for none
tossed up on off, Chigumbura comes forward and dabs it to the off side
fuller delivery on middle and leg. Elton gets forward to drive through mid on for a single.
fuller delivery on off stump. Again Waller looking to drive through cover but plays an inside edge shot to the leg side
full delivery on off stump. Waller defends this as the ball squeezes again to the leg side.
on a length on off stump. Defended to the offside.
pitches on a length outside off. Waller gets back and tries to cut this through backward point, but is unsuccessful
fuller delivery on off stump. Waller defends on the frontfoot.
on a length just outside off. Waller tries to cut this away but misses the line.
brought in slightly closer by Jadeja, on the same length. Waller defends to the offside.
short of a length ball and Waller seizes on it as he gets back and hits through mid on for a boundary. Poor ball from Jadeja after building up the pressure.
fuller delivery angling down the pads. Waller unable to get bat on it as it hits his pads, but ends up scurrying for a run. Signalled leg-bye by the umpire.
full delivery angling down the pads. Waller sticks his bat out to work this away behind square and is able to scamper for a quick two
lovely ball from Mishra! pitches slightly fuller of a length on off stump and spins back a great deal away from the batsman. Just passes the batsman's edge
full and on off stump. Defended to the offside.
pitched on a length on off and middle. Waller content to block the delivery
slightly short of a length in and around off stump. Again Waller is drawn forward as the ball passes the bat's edge.
played to backward square leg for a single
great line and length! pitches in and around off stump on a length. Batsman defends it back.
short ball outside off stump. Waller rocks back and plays a lofted pull shot that evades the Indian fieldsmen in the mid on region.
fuller delivery wide of off stump. Elton gets forward and drives through mid off for a single.
short ball outside off stump. Waller lets it through to the keeper.
short ball again from Mohit, this time on a middle and leg stump line. Waller defends it back to the bowler.
pitched just short of a length outside off stump. Waller brings his bat close to it, but aborts as the ball carries straight to the keeper.
fuller delivery on off stump. Elton dances down the track and heaves this over long off for a one-bounce boundary
fuller delivery on off and middle. Elton gets forward to block the ball.
full delivery outside off stump. Elton defends to the offside.
short of a length on middle and leg, angling down the pads. Elton tries to work it away to the leg side, but misses the ball
on a length outside off stump. Elton waits before cutting the ball through the offside, but finds the fielder.
fuller delivery on off stump. Elton defends to the leg side.
on a length outside off stump. Waller gets forward and opens his bat to steer this through point for a couple.
another short ball, this time Waller ducks for cover.
short of a length outside off stump. Waller content to let this through to the keeper.
short of a length on middle and leg. Waller defends this to the bowler.
full and on off stump. Waller waits on it before driving between past cover for a boundary. Lovely timing.
short of a length on off stump. Waller defends to mid off.
on a length and pitching on off stump, angling away from the batsman. Elton drives this through cover for a single.
shorter ball, this one spearing wide of off stump. Left alone by Waller.
short of a length on middle and off. Waller pushes this between cover and mid off for a single.
wide of off stump on a length. Elton steers this to third man.
slower ball outside off stump, angling into the batsman. Waller works this through cover for a single.
slower ball again, full and wide of off stump. Elton tries to squeeze this behind point, but finds the fielder.
fuller delivery on middle and leg. Waller defends to the leg side.
full delivery outside off stump. Waller plays this initially to mid off and sets off for a single, but is turned back by Elton, and is able to dive back to make his ground.
quicker delivery on off, Waller defends it back
worked away to mid on for a single
on a length pitched outside off stump. Elton gets forward to defend.
on a length outside off stump. Waller gets forward and drives this to sweeper cover for a single
short ball, rising sharply as Elton ducks under it.
fuller delivery on off stump. Elton defends to the offside.
short of a length on middle and off. Defended to point.
slower ball on middle and off. Elton gets forward to defend, thinks about the run, but ends up deciding against it.
fuller delivery on off stump. Elton gets forward and drives to long off for a single.
angled down leg, turned to fine leg for a single
flighted outside off with turn, pushed to point
pitched up on off, defended safely by Waller
that's a juicy and flighted full toss outside off, Waller slams it over the cow corner for a four
flatter on the stumps, defended by leaning forward
Mishra pitches a googly outside off, turns in and Waller defends it carefully on off
good length ball outside off, cut between point and third man, nicely timed and the batsmen take three. Mishra pretty slow there at the boundary
wider outside off, driven to cover on the front foot
round the wicket, attempted bouncer outside off, Waller turns it to mid-on for a single
short of length well outside off, turned to third man for an easy single
closer to the batsman this time and on good length, Waller tries to guide it fine but misses
good length ball on off, angling in, defended on the off side
full on the middle stump, driven down the ground over Waller's head and it's a boundary on the first ball of this Powerplay
good length ball on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
good length ball outside off, tucked to third man for a single
short ball on the stumps, not quite a bouncer and Waller turns his body a bit to pull it handsomely for a six over deep square leg
this one is a bouncer, the first for the over, and Waller lets it through to the keeper
good length ball outside off, Waller tries to guide it to third man and misses. 11 runs of that over
slower ball on length outside off, pushed on the off side by Chigumbura
quick ball, just short of a yorker on the pads, pushed down to mid-on by Chigumbura
short ball around off, Waller hooks it and it falls safe short of the fine leg fielder
attempted yorker turns into a full toss and it's steered to deep square leg for a couple of runs
another slower one outside off, Chigumbura cuts it late to third man for a single

Mohit has produced another outside edge and another wicket! He pitched it on length right on the off stump and it seamed away a bit to take the edge to Karthik, who does well to put his gloves under the ball as it was going to fall short
round the wicket and full on the off stump, driven down to long-off
flatter and shorter, pushed to cover
fuller and on the stumps, defended safely
pitched full, defended to cover
full again, pushed back to the bowler
full on the stumps, driven to long-off for a single
short of length on the stumps, defended on the back foot
attempted yorker, but a low full toss on the pads and it's turned to midwicket
full outside off, handsomely driven, but he can't get it past cover
slower ball from back of the hand and a bit short of length, it bounces extra and is defended carefully by the batsman
short and quick on leg, Utseya tries to pull but is beaten by pace and fails to connect
short again, this time outside off and Utseya lets it go. It's a maiden from Mohit in a Powerplay
on length outside off and shaping away, turned to third man for a single
another wicket! Short ball outside off and Utseya has room to swing his arms but he hands a simple catch to Rohit Sharma at point. A very loose short from Utseya there
good length ball slightly outside off, Chatara leans forward and defends
short ball on the stumps, it bounces extra and surprises the batsman, who defends it on his toes on off for a single
shortish ball on off, defended easily for a dot ball
length ball outside off, Chigumbura chops it to third man for a single
short and slow, Chatara waits for the turn and slams it to sweeper cover for a single
full on the stumps, defended to cover
good length on off, Chatara stays back and defends
straighter this time, defended on the front foot this time

fist wicket for Mishra in the match! It was a conventional legspinner outside off and Chatara tries to sweep it on the leg side but it takes a leading edge and goes high up in the air. Jadeja takes the simplest of catches at cover
round the wicket with two slips to Vitori, who stays back and defends
full on the stumps, defended by leaning forward
length ball on stumps, defended again
slightly short outside off and driven to cover this time for a single
flat on length outside off, cut to third man for an easy couple
Kohli drops it at first slip. It pitched outside off and turned a bit, went straight to Kohli who spilled it
six after a drop! full on the stumps and Vitori sweeps it square for a six over the fielder
short of length outside off, Chigumbura waits for it to turn and steers it past cover and brings up his fifty
round the wicket with a slip, pitches it outside off and Vitori defends it
bowled him! Pitched it outside off on length, it turned and came into the batsman who tries to cut  on the back foot and misses it completely. Second wicket for Mishra
pitched on leg and goes down further for a wide

Kohli takes it at slip on this occasion. It pitched on length on off and turned away enough to take Chinouya's outside edge and go straight to first slip. Kohli had to bend down low and he slammed the ball on the ground after getting up. Maybe that's a celebration

inn2.comm: a full and straight ball, Pujara stays in his crease and plays on the leg side
and Pujara is away, opening the face slightly to steer a full ball angling across him to third man
good length on off stump, Rohit gets forward and defends with a straight bat
a wide half volley, Rohit reaches for it and square drives to point
another full ball closer to the batsman, driven on the front foot to cover
defended on the front foot on the off side
short of a length at the body from over the wicket, defended on the back foot on the leg side
good length on off and middle, Pujara gets behind the line and defends
short of a length around off stump, Pujara goes back and cuts towards cover
Pujara waits for the length ball to arrive on his pads before closing the face and clipping to backward square, where the fielder dives to his right to save runs
short of a length and straight, Pujara defends with a straight bat to the bowler
a short and wide ball outside off stump, Pujara has so much time to go back, stand tall and drive it through cover point, he timed that perfectly
Rohit gets on to the front foot and pushes towards cover
a full ball outside off stump, slanting across the right-hander, defended on the front foot
a fuller ball driven crisply off the front foot but straight to cover point
good length and straight, Rohit gets behind the line and defends from the crease
Rohit moves forward and opens the face to steer a length ball towards third man
short and wide outside off stump, Pujara lets it pass as it slants across him from over the wicket
short of a length outside off, Rohit gos back and times the square drive well but his placement isn't as good, the man at point dives to his right to cut it off
short of a length and at the body, defended on the back foot
Rohit moves back and tucks it off his hips to midwicket
worked off the pads behind square for a single, Chinouya's line was too straight
good length angling into off and middle, defended back to the bowler
played off the back foot towards point
a full ball angling across the right-hander, left alone by the batsman
a length ball on the pads, played from the crease to square leg
a wide half-volley, giving Rohit plenty of room to free his arms, and so he gets on to the front foot and flays the ball through cover with a flowing drive
played off the front foot towards extra cover
worked off the pads behind square for a single
good length angling across the right-hander, left alone by the batsman
length ball outside off, Rohit stays on the back foot and defends on the off side
played back to the bowler on the front foot
short of a length with width outside off, Rohit waits in his crease and cuts to third man
defended off the back foot on the leg side
a full ball outside off stump, it was the slower one, Pujara was on the front foot a bit too early but then he waited and drove it into the covers
defended on the back foot to the bowler
good length on middle and off, Rohit stays in his crease and opens the face of the bat to play towards point
defended on the front foot through point
a fuller ball on middle and off, Rohit moves forward and plays back to the bowler
short of a length angling across the right-hander, cut off the back foot to point
good length and straight, defended on the back foot
Rohit drives loosely away from his body at a good length ball that leaves him and is beaten. That's the first uncertain moment in India's chase
a full ball wide outside off, Pujara wants nothing to do with it
good length around off stump, defended on the off side
short and wide outside off, Pujara goes back and gives it a crack, cutting the ball firmly through point
full ball on off stump, Pujara was trying to drive straight but the bat turned in his hand and the ball went to mid-on
Pujara thrusts his pad outside the line of off while defending and gets an inside edge on to it, the ball goes towards third man
short and wide outside off, cut off the back foot to third man
length ball on the pads, nudged off the front foot towards square leg
banged in short and Pujara swivels on one leg and hooks along the ground through backward square
defended on the back foot towards midwicket
terrific save at short cover! Rohit drove that firmly off the front foot, timing the half-volley well, but the fielder at short cover moved to his right and stopped it
played from the crease on the off side
Rohit steps out to drive the ball on the full but can't beat cover
short of a length outside off, left alone by the batsman
short of a length outside off and the ball bounces sharply after the batsman plays no shot

bowled him! Pujara's debut innings has ended with his leg stump getting uprooted. He drove from his crease, leaving a gap between bat and pad, at a good length ball that seamed into him, he got an inside edge and the ball crashed into his stumps
short of a length and straight, Raina stays on the back foot and defends
a full ball outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
nearly in the blockhole and Raina moves forward to dig it out
driven off the front foot through mid-on
played off the back foot towards point
Raina lunges forward and drives along the ground to long off
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
steps out of his crease to get to the pitch of the ball and clips it through square leg
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Rohit tries to glance but misses and is hit on the thigh by one that slants into him
defended on the back foot on the off side
a half volley with lots of width outside off, angling across the left-hander from over the wicket, Raina square drives off the front foot to the point boundary
defended on the off side
punched off the front foot through cover
Rohit stays in his crease and clips the ball off his pads behind square
short ball on off stump, Raina goes back to cut but can't beat point
up and over! Raina steps out of his crease, gets to the pitch of the ball, and lofts it dead straight over the bowler's head
driven along the ground to long off
played off the back foot on the leg side
Rohit is well out of his crease as he drives a full ball into the gap on the cover boundary
nudged off the front foot to mid-on
pushed on the front foot to cover
a full ball on the pads, flicked in front of square for a single
Rohit leans across and closes the face to tuck the ball off his pads behind square
Raina moves across in his crease and works the ball off his pads behind square
driven on the front foot through cover
nudged off the front foot to short fine leg
flicked off the front foot through midwicket
Raina strides forward and drives through cover
defended back to the bowler
Rohit moves forward to a flighted delivery and blocks
defended on the off side
a full ball angling into the left-hander outside off, Raina drives on the front foot to cover
a half volley outside off and Raina plays the square drive off the front foot through cover
that's far too wide outside off
defended on the off side
punched off the front foot on the off side
good length on off stump, played on the front foot on the leg side
played off the back foot through point
tossed up on off stump, played off the back foot towards point
Raina gets down on one knee and sweeps to long leg
played off the front foot towards long off
nudged off the pads on the front foot to square leg
driven on the front foot towards cover
played off the front foot on the leg side
anging away from off on length, Raina guides it to third man
full on the pads, steered to square leg comfortably using the wrists
full length ball outside off, driven to mid-off and Raina says no straightaway
slower and short on middle stump, Raina tucks it square of fine leg for a couple
full outside off, Raina drives it to cover where Sibanda dives to his left to stop it
short on off and angling away, Raina tucks it on the leg side for a single
flighted on leg stump, Raina comes forward and defends
flighted towards the pads, Raina moves his right foot out of the way and uses is wrists to turn it to the cow corner for a four
shorter aorund leg stump, Raina goes back and turns it on the leg side for a single
round the wicket to Rohit, pitched up and he comes down and drives to long-off for a single
length ball on middle, pushed to cover
length ball outside leg, Raina goes back, lets it turn towards the stumps and defends
pitched on length outside off, left alone
full on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
length ball outside off, Rohit leans forward and pushes it towards cover
full and angling in towards the batsman, Raina turns it to fine leg
that's a beautiful lofted straight drive from Rohit. It was pitched up just outside off, Rohit stepped forward and launched it over the bowler's head for a four
outside off on length again, driven wide of point to sweeper cover
round the wicket, pitched up on middle, Rohit turns fine on the leg side for a single
flighted on the leg stump, Raia comes forward and lofts it without much power to the left of long-off but it has enough momentum to just beat the fielder for a four
full on the pads, defended on the front foot
flighted towards the pads, turned on the leg side with the wrists
length ball on off, rohit comes forward and pushed t back to the bowler
pitched up outside off, Rohit drives it powerfully and it bounces once before going to point
flighted outside off, Raina leans forward and pushed it with soft hands for a single
round the wicket outside off, defended on the front foot
shorter outside off, defended behind square
length ball on off, Rohit comes down and defends
shorter ball and outside off, pushed down to long-off for a single
short of length on off and turning in, tucked to midwicket for a single
flighted on middle and turning away, Raina stays back and cuts to point
flighted on leg, tucked to the leg side on the half-volley
round the wicket just outside off, Rohit comes down and turns it towards midwicket
short of length outside leg, defended on the front foot
slightly closer to the stumps on similar length, defended again
slightly shorter outside leg, Raina goes back and pushes it to midwicket
short and outside off, Raina goes back and pulls with power to midwicket who dives and saves three runs
length ball on the stumps, pushed down just wide of the bowler who should have stopped this one
lenght ball outside off, defended inside the crease
flatter on the off stump, driven down to long-on for a single
pitched up on middle and leg, defended with soft hands
short and outside off, driven down to long-off easily
pitched on middle, Rohit comes forward and misses it
on leg stump again, tucked to midwicket

pitched up on off, Rohit comes down and slams it down the ground but it has struck Raina straight on his left wrist. Raina is in pain here and is being attended to by the physio who is strapping the wrist with crepe bandage
tossed up on leg stump, Raina comes forward and defends on the off side
short of length on leg stump and turns away down leg
pitched up on off, tucked on the leg side
full on middle stump, Rohit comes down and drives to cover
short of length on middle and angling in, turned wide of midwicket for a single
short of length outside off, Raina cuts it late wide of short third man
length ball on off, defended on the back foot
shorter and outside off, defended again easily
tossed on the off stump and turning in, Raina turns is square on the leg side by leaning forward
short of length around off, Rohit comes down and tries to loft it towards long-on but it takes a thick, leading edge and goes to the left of long-off, easy couple
quicker length ball on off, pushed to point
shorter and on off, pushed towards point for a quick single
length ball on leg stump, turned to fine leg off the pads
short of length on leg, Raina goes back and punches it back to the bowler
full and on middle and off, Raina chips it over mid-off
length ball on middle, turned with the wrists to deep square leg
that's a short ball on the stumps, Rohit goes back and pulls it with power along the ground and beats the deep square leg fielder for a four
pitched up on middle and leg, tucked to the leg side for a quick single
flighted way outside off, Raina tries to drive and it takes an inside edge after pitching on a rough patch
full ball on middle, driven down to long-off by Rohit who brings up his fifty off 84 balls
length ball outside off, Raina comes forward and pushes it to cover
shorter and on middle, Raina comes forward and turns it to midwicket for his fifty too. His took 60 balls, though
round the wicket and pitches it up on middle and leg, hits Raina's pads but is going down
full ball angled towards the pads, Raina drives it on the on side for a quick couple

fullish and outside off, Raina tries to steer it to on side again but the turn beats him and is he stumped here? He came out while trying to drive and Taylor unsettled the bails in no time. The third umpire has been called for, it's a very close call. And it seems like Raina might have made it back, replays are not so conclusive and it's given not out
full and on middle, pushed to cover
shortr on off, Raina lets it turn away and steers it to point
full and on leg stump, driven to long-on for a single
full and far outside off, Raina sticks out his bat horizontally to guide it to short third man
slower full toss outside off, Rohit drives it to the left of long-off for two
short ball angling towards the pads, turned to deep square leg off the pads
full and on the leg stump, Raina drives it powerfully down the ground to the right of mid-on, ho dives in vain as it goes for a four
It was a wide full toss outside off and Raina punched it towards sweeper cover where Waller dived to his right and the ball fell just short of him, he did well to stop it there
he pitches it on the leg stump and Raina doesn't miss these. Turned his wrists and drove it past square leg for another four. 14 runs off that over
wide full toss outside off, missed completely by Rohit
another wide ball outside off, Rohit sticks his bat out and finds the gap between point and short third man for a four
lofted hight into the air and that's a big one! It was pitched up on middle and Rohit whacked it over the long-on for a big big six
full and outside off, driven to backward point for a single
full toss on the pads and Raina turns it deep-backward square leg for an easy couple even though only one was required to win and India have finished the chase with 19.1 overs to spare
